title: Hanun, king of the Ammonites, humiliates the envoys of King David (2 Samuel 10:4)
medium: black chalk heightened with white on blue paper
credit_line: Gift of Dr. and Mrs. Daniel Fishkoff
provenance_text:
Dr. and Mrs. Daniel Fishkoff, Colonia, NJ by December 4, 1975 [1]; their gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1975.

[1]. Received at the museum on December 4, 1975.
